software_dependencies.python: Not specified, but the script uses python commands
software_dependencies.Theano: Theano is used to run the model on the GPU, with flags set to device=gpu0/1 and floatX=float32

details.script_purpose: This script launches a distributed training process using the ImportanceSamplingSGD framework. It sets up a database, a master process, and two worker processes on separate GPUs to train a model. The script also sets environment variables, configures paths, and utilizes PBS features for resource management.
